players.name: Bob
memory: The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.

Charlie: "Charlie has been investigating and I am the mafioso.
I will not reveal this to the town yet, but be cautious of me."

Diana: "I am innocent and will help the town.
"
You: "Bob is the mafioso, and I killed Alice last night. I suggest we all be cautious of Charlie since he admitted to being the mafioso but might still be lying."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie
